cd:Attribute.name: Masked_out_spectral_channels_for_SIF_retrieval____
cd:Attribute.real_name: Masked-out spectral channels for SIF retrieval (#)

cd:Attribute.name: FWHM_of_macro_channels_for_TOA_reflectance
cd:Attribute.real_name: FWHM of macro-channels for TOA reflectance

cd:Attribute.name: standard_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: retrieved SIF@740 735-758 nm fitting window (for clear-sky analysis only)

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Mean TOA Radiance in fitting window

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Mean TOA Radiance in fitting window

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: TOA Reflectance in far-red atmospheric windows

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Spectral points at which TOA_RFL is calculated

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Reduced Chi^2 value of the fit

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Reduced Chi^2 value of the fit

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Quality assessment information for each ground pixel

cd:Attribute.name: flag_meanings
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: no_error solar_eclipse sun_glint_possible descending night geo_boundary_crossing geolocation_error

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The four latitude boundaries of each ground pixel.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The four longitude boundaries of each ground pixel.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The altitude of the spacecraft relative to the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Latitude of the spacecraft sub-satellite point on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Longitude of the spacecraft sub-satellite point on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Relative offset (0.0 ... 1.0) of the measurement in the orbit

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Solar azimuth angle at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured clockwise from the North (East = +90, South = -+180, West = -90)

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Solar zenith angle at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured away from the vertical. ESA definition of day side: SZA less the 92 degrees

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Azimuth angle of the satellite at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured clockwise from the North (East = +90, South = -+180, West = -90)

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Zenith angle of the satellite at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured away from the vertical.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Coregistered effective radiometric cloud fraction using the OCRA/ROCINN CAL model.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Time difference with time for each measurement

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: offset from the reference start time of measurement

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This dimension variable defines the indices across track; index starts at 0

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Latitude of the center of each ground pixel on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Longitude of the center of each ground pixel on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This dimension variable defines the indices along track; index starts at 0

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Reference time of the measurements. The reference time is set to yyyy-mm-ddT00:00:00 UTC, where yyyy-mm-dd is the day on which the measurements of a particular data granule start.
